title: Katarina ulti problem urf
body:
So I was playing katarina on urf and her ult was working fine lower levels however towards the higher levels it simply stopped working I couldnt hit r or click the spell icon to make her ult

Has anyone else experienced this

replies.body: Maybe it's a sign you should stop, or that you don't even need her ult in URF?
I haven't played her myself but my friend had no issues last night.
